name: Song of Asirra - Demo 2
description:
This is the second playable demo of Song of Asirra! You'll get to fight your way to the top of a challenge tower, claiming medals to earn your freedom!

This demo was released as a free benefit for Patreon patrons on May 12th, 2019. Patrons in the $3 tier and up can link their accounts to claim this demo for free! For more information on the benefits of being a Song of Asirra patron check out the Patreon homepage.
